t: AMAZON.COM: SAN PELLEGRINO, WATER SPARKLING MINERAL, 33.8 FL OZ
s: I drink herbal teas and sparkling mineral water in order to hydrate. I love the taste and tingliness of sparkling mineral water and San Pellegrino is just about the best. I ordered some in aluminum cans for convenience, but my preference is for the glass bottles.
